title: Emerald Floral Gold Necklace - Panchavati Haaram
features: Intricate floral design with alternating emeralds and CZ stones. The necklace features a layered pendant and gold sphere droplets (gundlu). The chain blends gold and diamond designs for a modern twist. Traditional South Indian craftsmanship blended with a contemporary necklace design, perfect for the modern bride. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings.
occasions: traditional South Indian celebrations like Seemantham or Voni Function (Half-Saree Function)
and high-end festive occasions. Also suitable for formal events and evening wear to make a grand statement.
description: This Panchavati Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The high-quality emeralds and intricate gold work make it a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and exceptional durability. This necklace is a true statement piece, perfect for those who appreciate fine craftsmanship and timeless elegance.
